IMAAd.h
1 //
2 // IMAAd.h
3 // GoogleIMA3
4 //
5 // Copyright (c) 2013 Google Inc. All rights reserved.
6 //
7 // Represents metadata of a single ad. The user can use this metadata for
8 // positioning nonlinear ads (isLinear, width, height), internal tracking
9 // (adId, adTitle) or custom behavior (traffickingParameters).
10 
11 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
12 
13 #import "IMAAdPodInfo.h"
14 
16 @interface IMAAd : NSObject
17 
19 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSString *adId;
20 
22 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSString *adTitle;
23 
25 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSString *adDescription;
26 
30 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSString *contentType;
31 
33 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSTimeInterval duration;
34 
36 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSArray *uiElements;
37 
41 @property(nonatomic, readonly) int width;
42 @property(nonatomic, readonly) int height;
43 
45 @property(nonatomic, readonly, getter=isLinear) BOOL linear;
46 
48 @property(nonatomic, readonly, getter=isSkippable) BOOL skippable;
49 
51 @property(nonatomic, readonly) IMAAdPodInfo *adPodInfo;
52 
55 @property(nonatomic, readonly) NSString *traffickingParameters;
56 
57 @end
